body:
Attention everyone!

Due to the recent collapse of the old hub, a new one has been put in its place so there is less lag and so its easier to get from gamemode to gamemode. Keep in mind this is a temporary hub until the Winter Update comes out, but the current hub was work under all the map developers. We hope the smaller world size and map itself will not cause any issues for you to log on and play! Post any feedback below as well, and questions in the Mapdev AMA thread.

So, here it is! take a look at the new hub, brought to you by the Map Development team:
body_tagged:

We hope the smaller world size and map itself will not cause any issues for you to log on and play! Post any feedback below as well, and questions in the Mapdev AMA thread.

So, here it is! take a look at the new hub, brought to you by the Map Development team:
title: New Lobby !
